item.title: Building back - Week 1
item.description: Week 1 - Base Building I have decided to do my training on a softer surface. Not a bad idea, I might keep this for a while. I completed four (4) runs during the first week of running outdoors and one (1) cross-training session. Here is the summary in a Table below 04 to 11 August 2024 Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Saturday Sunday Total 30 min @ Easy Rest 30 min @ Easy 30 min @ Easy Rest 45 min @ Easy 30 min Indoor cycling 2:15:49 (excl.
